body: Now I know alot of people are wining about how they want Mczone back and alot of people are making threads requesting new gamemodes, but this is different, I, like half the players in avicus, play walls and nexus, but after 3 - 5 games I get bored of doing the same thing again and again, making armor/ building skybasing doing the samething again and again, so I eventually get bored and decide to go play on another survival / faction server because its not repeating the game again and again, the whole point of this thread is, inorder to keep players gaming on avicus, we need to add gamemodes like factions and survival and creative where players can increase their creativity, where they dont have to repeat the game again and again.

-1.

Survival Games would be okay, but Factions and Survival would just go on and on forever. How would you earn prestiges and XP in those gamemodes?

Too many servers have these gamemodes, and Avicus wants something original, not something that every single server has; hence Avicade.
